![Decompiled SLocker Android Ransomware Source Code Published Online](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-3P4tXkE1F-Y/WXXojwU-S5I/AAAAAAAAtvs/d_AW1Kd5dUQXPspdaU4cRGoyqUQjTzK1wCLcBGAs/s1600/SLocker-Android-ransomware-Source-code.png)

Bad news for Android users — Decompiled source code of for one of the oldest mobile and popular Android ransomware families has been published online, making it available for cyber criminals who can use it to develop more customised and advanced variants of Android ransomware.
